items.question: What skin concerns can HERO help with?
items.answer: HERO offers doctor-prescribed treatments for acne, pigmentation, uneven tone, and early signs of ageing. Every plan is customised to your skin type and goals for clear, confident results.

items.question: Are the skincare treatments prescription-based?
items.answer: Yes. All HERO skincare plans are created and prescribed by qualified doctors after reviewing your online assessment. You'll receive products tailored to your skin's unique needs and condition.

items.question: How soon will I notice visible improvements?
items.answer: Most users begin to see healthier, clearer skin within 6–8 weeks when following their plan consistently. Your doctor will review your progress and adjust the treatment as needed.

items.question: Can I use HERO if I have sensitive or reactive skin?
items.answer: Definitely. HERO doctors design routines that match your skin's sensitivity level. If irritation occurs, your plan can be adjusted for comfort and results.

items.question: Is everything handled online?
items.answer: Yes — from your consultation to your prescription and delivery, everything happens online. You'll receive your skincare in discreet packaging with ongoing support from your doctor.

items.question: How does HERO help with hair loss?
items.answer: HERO connects you with licensed doctors who create a personalised treatment plan to slow down hair loss and encourage regrowth — all managed online and delivered to your door.

items.question: Are the hair treatments doctor-prescribed?
items.answer: Yes. Every plan is reviewed and prescribed by a qualified doctor after assessing your goals and hair condition. You'll receive safe, evidence-based treatments without visiting a clinic.

items.question: How long does it take to see results?
items.answer: Most users start noticing reduced hair fall and visible regrowth within three to six months of consistent use. Regular check-ins help your doctor track progress and make any needed adjustments.

items.question: Can HERO help with early-stage hair thinning too?
items.answer: Absolutely. Starting early often gives the best results. HERO offers tailored prevention and maintenance plans for men who want to protect their hair before significant loss begins.

items.question: Is everything handled online?
items.answer: Yes — from your consultation to your prescriptions and deliveries. All treatments are shipped discreetly across Australia, and you'll have continuous access to your care team for support.
